Sentence.value: - A hole in the heart (ventricular septal defect) - Abnormalities of the left heart valves - An aneurysm of the heart wall - Areas of the heart are not contracting normally - Blood flow problems on the left side of the heart - Heart-related blockages - Weakened pumping function of the left ventricle Coronary angiography may be needed when blockage of the coronary arteries is suspected.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - A [[hole|C0544726]] in the [[heart|C0018787]] (ventricular septal defect) - Abnormalities of the left heart valves - An aneurysm of the heart wall - Areas of the heart are not contracting normally - Blood flow problems on the left side of the heart - Heart-related blockages - Weakened pumping function of the left ventricle Coronary angiography may be needed when blockage of the coronary arteries is suspected.

annotation.surface-form: heart - Heart-related blockages - Weakened pumping function
